name: Swordmaster
effects: Increase ATK and DEF by 20% when equipped with a Dagger
Increase ATK and DEF by 20% when equipped with a Sword
Increase ATK and DEF by 20% when equipped with a Great Sword
Increase ATK and DEF by 20% when equipped with a Katana

name: Swordmaster
劍之聖者
소드 마스터
Maîtrise des épées
Schwertmeister
Maestro espadachín
desc_short: Boost ATK and DEF when equipped with a sword, large sword, or short sword
提高裝備劍大劍短劍時攻擊和防禦的數值
검, 대검, 칼, 단검 장착 시 공격력과 방어력 상승
Augmente l'ATT et la DEF lorsqu'une épée, une longue épée ou une épée courte est équipée
Erhöht ANG und ABW, wenn Schwert, Langschw. oder Kurzschw. ausger.
Aumenta ATQ/DEF al llevar espadas (sin importar tamaño)
desc_long: Boosts ATK and DEF when equipped with a large sword, sword, katana, or short sword.
提高裝備劍大劍短劍時攻擊和防禦的數值。
검, 대검, 칼, 단검을 장착하면 공격력과 방어력이 상승합니다.
Augmente l'ATT et la DEF lorsqu'une épée, une longue épée ou une épée courte est équipée
Erhöht ANG und ABW, wenn mit Schwert, Langschwert, Katana oder Kurzschwert ausgerüstet.
Aumenta ATQ/DEF al llevar espadas (sin importar tamaño)
